author: AdrianoDee
body:
#### PR description:

In the `HLTriggerOffline/B2G/` analyzers the `edm::TriggerResults` `InputTag` process string is hardcoded to be `HLT` and this prevents us from running the validation on a `reHLT` process. This PR proposes a fix for this behavior moving from a `std::string` input parameter to a `edm::InputTag` one. See https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/issues/47482 for further details.
title: Reading `TriggerResults` from an `InputTag` for B2G HLT Analyzers
